attributes.additional_details:
Simple 3 digit number

No need to talk - Just call

Instant number location recognition

Instant local emergency vehicle dispatch

This would mean someone who can not speak, with a stroke, heart attack, collapsed lung, severe allergic reaction or injury of the mouth or throat could simply dial and someone would be sent right away from that local station to the location of the telephone used to make the call.

Your home phone recognized by area code

Your mobile recognized by GPS location

Saving 2 minutes - Saves more lives

Number recognition - Less misuse calls

The purpose of this number is..

2 save 2 minutes 2 save more lives
